definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
to have perfect mastery of sth/to be up to the mark
to harden/hardening/sclerosis/fig. to become rigid or inflexible in opinions/to ossify
to brace oneself to do sth/to put a bold face on it/to summon up courage/to force oneself to

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代碼行的結尾用硬編碼空格或製表符。

sentences.english: Teachers squeeze the knowledge into the heads of the students.
sentences.chinese: 老師將知識硬塞進學生的頭腦中。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with stiff, dry branches which have rotted off as the trees die.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是硬而乾的樹枝，都是因樹死而凋落下來的。

sentences.english: The quite demeanor of the Capricorn is easily misinterpreted as cold and hard hearted.
sentences.chinese: 摩羯的這種表現很容易讓人誤解爲冷漠和硬心腸。

sentences.english: The outer rind is so thick and tough that from whatever height it may fall it is never broken.
sentences.chinese: 它的外殼是那樣硬，從多高的樹上掉下來都不會摔破。

sentences.english: After pulling off the shell, she observed the hard-boiled egg inside.
sentences.chinese: 當女兒敲碎蛋殼發現裏面已經是被煮得很硬的蛋白。

sentences.english: This graphite filled material offers the best bearing surface with hard chrome plated piston rod.
sentences.chinese: 這石墨填充材料提供了硬鍍鉻活塞桿最好的軸承表面。

sentences.english: We are modeling them as hard spheres.
sentences.chinese: 我們把它們想象爲硬球體。

sentences.english: A light-colored tuff used in hydraulic cement.
sentences.chinese: 粗麪凝灰岩一種用來生產硬。

sentences.english: Suitable for soft to medium hard Non-abrasive formation.
sentences.chinese: 適應於軟到中硬非研磨性地層。

sentences.english: In the foyer, herringbone hardwood floors with a walnut border were installed.
sentences.chinese: 在門廳裏，人字形硬木地板與核桃邊境被安裝。

sentences.english: She gagged on a piece of hard bread.
sentences.chinese: 她被一塊硬麪包噎住了。

sentences.english: but some of that cost is due to being hard-real-time and not just the read-barrier per-se.
sentences.chinese: 但是，一些消耗在於硬實時和不僅僅是讀操作屏障。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ixodes persulcatus was confirmed as Lyme disease vector.
sentences.chinese: 結論全溝硬蜱是吉林省萊姆病的主要媒介。

sentences.english: We’re removing all hardcoded paths from the framework.
sentences.chinese: 我們從框架中移除了所有的硬編碼的路徑。

sentences.english: One is a medium-sized hard gray suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 一件是個中型的灰色硬皮箱。

definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
to endure with all one's will/to hold out/rigid/stiff
